items.sentence: Tom is likely to be shot if he's not careful.
Did Tom tell you where to put your suitcases?
I've been waiting for you guys all afternoon.
Are you going to leave me here all by myself?
I can help you with that if you'd like me to.
We sat on the park bench and fed the pigeons.
Tom went into the kitchen to get some snacks.
Did anyone other than Tom give Mary anything?
Tom said that Mary hopes that John does that.
This is the last time that I'll ever do this.
